rules: Rule1: If the show violates broadcasting guidelines, then either the show receives criticism or, provided that the show runs alcohol advertisements, the show does not have an alcohol company sponsor
Rule2: Either the show violates broadcasting guidelines or the show faces controversy
Rule3: If the show faces controversy, then either the show receives criticism or, under the condition that the show runs alcohol advertisements, the show does not have an alcohol company sponsor
Rule4: Either the show gets fined, or the show loses sponsors, or, given that having a game segment does not result in the show being successful, the show does not change its format
Rule5: Either the show faces a lawsuit or the show does not get fined
Rule6: If the show receives complaints, then the show does not face a lawsuit
Rule7: If the show moves to a different time slot, then the show does not get cancelled
Rule8: If the show gets edited for content, then the show does not get cancelled
Rule9: Either the show gets cancelled or the show does not have high ratings
Rule10: If the show revamps its content, then the show does not maintain its ratings
Rule11: If the show wins an award, then the show does not get cancelled
Rule12: Either the show wins an award or the show gets renewed
Rule13: If the show gets renewed, then the show does not get cancelled
Rule14: If the show includes drinking scenes, then the show features alcohol content
Rule15: If it is not true that having a game segment leads to the show being successful, then the show changes its format
Rule16: Should neither the show move to a different time slot nor the show get edited for content occur, then the show becomes a cult hit
Rule17: Provided that the condition that not having a game segment lead to success does not result in the show not changing its format is false, then the show maintains its ratings
Rule18: If the show is not successful, then the show has high ratings
Rule19: If the show is not successful, then the show includes drinking scenes
Rule20: If the show is not successful, then the show has an alcohol company sponsor
Rule21: If the show is not successful, then the show runs alcohol advertisements
Rule22: If the show is not successful, then the show does not feature alcohol content
facts: Fact1: The show has a game segment
Fact3: The show revamps its content
Fact4: The show does not lose sponsors
Fact5: The show does not become a cult hit
Fact6: The show does not receive criticism
